item.description: Sorry for the delay again,I just made a reservation for 10 at Kon Asian Bistro, we haven't had asian cuisine in quite some time. I asked for a table, not the Hibachi,with the confusion over the check that we've had, thought a table would be better and to my surprise they will have seperate checks for us. This will make this experience much better for those who eat sushi and those that don't. Sharing is at your discretion.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for Susan Lemay

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Kon Asian Bistro
